EmailTemplate.name: Turbonomic conversation follow up (1495031211.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic conversation follow up (1495031211.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Mike, Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today and giving me some insight into your cloud strategy at MicroStrategy. As discussed, below is some information about how we’ve helped other technology vertical customers assure the performance of their applications on less infrastructure for you to pass along. In short, Turbonomic helps our technology partners/customers like HP, Cisco and BMC to: Assure Application Performance in Real Time o 80% decrease in tickets and alerts (become more operationally efficient) o Preventing problems before they become issues (we are the only platform that does this) Drive Efficiency in Environment o 40% increase in VM/Host Density as workloads get the intelligence to dictate the resources they need, saving hundreds of thousands of CapEx in the infrastructure.Capacity Plano Forecasting and tons of “what-if” scenarios around h/w refresh, DC moves, Consolidations etc...Cloud Economics with BMC | A Turbonomic Success Story <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5YdMHJKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAk%2DhTzTtlKmUf4xCfLFh%5FNdo66m2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXYpwghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSdql6620%5Fo2wCUGGVUsPjJ00iSKKxzoeRQtnh20UkKStmjzS%5FukYUomHUC%2DNkltBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DOOR%5Ftjmim25gVMk7QhiekStxkXkj4qRT96qothamPH%5FrCHXzoh2N0QuIA9A7kUbDmNIV4hDgCw7vyMFza3L0BPPsjlS0YcnUvnIVE6EPG4Y%2C/j01QeM3JL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90xaeaLBU8VEJ9vzwFRGfPYc44N6udYBgy9SnbwhqeXeIRaeflnydNj8Kaq1WkG59%2DPkROTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UvVzuX9lmUcNUBmSE6h5EKxZmxd5W113rlp2bV%5FT3WE0Nz6JKYwGmvFbBfvP4As3QjrQMCOLPS]]> Thank you for your help. Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]> Going to Cisco Live?
